name: The quest of the extremely tiny hat
name_original: The quest of the extremely tiny hat
description:
Find an extremely tiny hat in an extremely tiny world. not only is the hat tiny, also the resolution of this game is extremely small, only 64X64 pixels. All pixel art is handcrafted to fit in a tiny world. The big trees make you feel even tinier. Made for the Goedware game jam 1 by Jael137.

Move left - left arrow / A
Move right - right arrow / D
Jump - Z / Arrow up / W
Attack - X / Space bar

All art, code and audio by me(Jael137)
